text: ohuma utpadanayan (pera nidasunak nomÃ¦tivama arambhayedi) nirmanaya karanneya. ohuma (eva maranayata pat vu pasuda, pana di) eva punarutthanaya karanneya. meya ohuta itamat pahasuya. ahashida, bhumiyehida itamat usas upamavan ohutama ayitiya. ohu (siyallata) balasampannayeku ha gnanavantayeku vasayen sitinneya
